mapper.sql: commodity_category_id, attachment_id, type, sort, title, add_user_id, add_date

t_commodity_category.commodity_category_id "commodityCategoryId", t_commodity_category.attachment_id "attachmentId", t_commodity_category.type "type", t_commodity_category.sort "sort", t_commodity_category.title "title", t_commodity_category.add_user_id "addUserId", t_commodity_category.add_date "addDate"
